Posts.Content: Hi have just signed on to site is it possible to let me know more about these lawsuits have never heard of them `til now was on premarin for 25years had a lumpectomy for IDC 3months ago gp stopped hrt have letrozole now and my life is amisery have started meno and side effects of letrezole as my hrt was 1.25 mgs its just awful.
